alert.note: Alert for Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Malibu Coast; Santa Monica Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 13 at 12:11PM PST until February 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands, Malibu Coast, Santa Monica Mountains, Los Angeles County Beaches, Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles and Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Malibu Coast; Santa Monica Mountains
